description: Verification obligations matrix for all open/in_progress critique beads. Maps each bead to required evidence types with current coverage status. Blocks bead closure when evidence is missing.

coverage_statuses.complete: All required evidence artifacts exist and pass validation
coverage_statuses.partial: Some evidence exists but is incomplete
coverage_statuses.missing: No evidence artifacts exist for this obligation
coverage_statuses.not_required: This evidence type is not required for this bead

obligation_types.unit_tests: Comprehensive unit tests (happy-path, negative, adversarial, regression cases)
obligation_types.e2e_scripts: Deterministic e2e scripts exercising strict and hardened modes
obligation_types.structured_logs: JSONL-formatted logs with trace_id, mode, API/symbol, outcome, errno, timing, artifact_refs
obligation_types.perf_evidence: Benchmark data proving overhead targets (strict<20ns, hardened<200ns)
obligation_types.conformance_fixtures: Machine-readable test fixtures with POSIX-referenced input/output/errno expectations
obligation_types.golden_artifacts: Deterministic golden output files with SHA256 regression checks

row_status_states.missing: One or more required sections have no commands and no artifact paths
row_status_states.partial: Required sections are only partially populated, or close_blockers is non-empty
row_status_states.complete: All required sections have >=1 command and >=1 artifact path; close_blockers is empty

row_status_transitions.when: any required section has command_count=0 and artifact_count=0
no required section is empty but at least one required section has command_count=0 xor artifact_count=0, or close_blockers is non-empty
all required sections have command_count>=1 and artifact_count>=1 and close_blockers is empty

expected_assertions: all required checks pass
README and FEATURE_PARITY snapshots match reality_report.v1.json
strict and hardened scenario runs emit case_pass/case_fail records with trace IDs
core binaries execute under LD_PRELOAD in strict and hardened modes
stream_examples.notes: Syscall/interposition smoke row with explicit remaining blocker.

expected_assertions: stub fallback contracts and guard checks pass
expected-loss matrix checks and evidence payload checks pass in strict and hardened modes
strict<20ns and hardened<200ns envelope checks remain within budget
stream_examples.notes: Performance-proof row for benchmark gate stream.
